short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get 'Image Downloader for Zedge', the simple Chrome extension for quick image downloads from Zedge.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get Quickly images easily with 'Image Downloader for Zedge', a simple Chrome extension. Enjoy fast downloads and easy access to tons of pictures and wallpapers without any hassle."

Zedge Chrome extension Features:

1. It's light and easy to use.
2. Fast and high-quality image/wallpaper downloads.
3. No redirection makes saving images straightforward.
4. Can quickly and easily download any kind of images or wallpapers.

How to USe Zedge Chrome extension On your Browser:

It's light and easy to use: After installing the Zedge Chrome extension for PC, visit the Zedge webpage and click on the extension icon. Then, place your mouse pointer/cursor over the images, and you will find the Downloader button. Now, save it in high resolution directly to your computer.
